title: Consultation & Concept
subtitle: STEP 01
desc: We start with an in-depth consultation to understand your lifestyle, preferences, and functional needs. We discuss themes, budgets, and timelines to establish a clear vision for your space.

title: Space Planning & Layout
subtitle: STEP 02
desc: Our designers create detailed 2D layouts to optimize space utilization. We focus on flow, functionality, and ergonomics to ensure the space is both beautiful and practical.

title: 3D Visualisation & Material Selection
subtitle: STEP 03
desc: We present realistic 3D renders so you can visualize the final look before work begins. We guide you in selecting premium materials, finishes, lighting, and furniture that match your style.

title: Execution & Management
subtitle: STEP 04
desc: Our project managers oversee the on-site execution, coordinating with carpenters, painters, and electricians. We ensure all work is executed as per the approved designs and quality standards.

title: Styling & Handover
subtitle: STEP 05
desc: The final touches are addedâ€”decor, lighting fixtures, and furnishings. We conduct a final walkthrough to ensure every detail is perfect before handing over your transformed space.
